title: Brought to Light
description: Brought to Thirty Years of Drug Smuggling, Arms Deals, and Covert Action is an anthology of two political graphic novels, published originally by Eclipse Comics in 1988, with a Hardcover version published in 1989. Both stories are based on material from lawsuits filed by the Christic Institute against the US Government. The two stories are The Secret Team by Alan Moore and Bill Sienkiewicz, and The LA Penca Bombing documented by Martha Honey and Tony Avirgan and adapted by Joyce Brabner and Tom Yeates. Brought to Light was edited overall by Joyce Brabner, Catherine Yronwode acted as executive editor, and Eclipse publisher Dean Mullaney was the publication designer.
author: Alan             Moore
